section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated on the authority of Alqama and Aswad by another chain of transmitters and in the hadith transmitted by Ibn Mus-hir and Jabir the words are:" I perceive as if I am seeing the gap between the fingers of the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) as he was bowing
